awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: An eccentric and dogmatic inventor sells his house and takes his family to Central America to build a utopia in the middle of the jungle. Conflicts with his family, a local preacher and with nature are only small obstacles to his obsession. Based upon a Paul Theroux novel.

title: The Mosquito Coast
